phrases: I did not realize anyone was there!
It is been a long time, madam.
It really has been a long time.
Your face looked a bit better back then.
I told you, did not I Emma?
That I used to be a governess.
Well this is the Young Master I cared for, William Jones.
Have you stopped wetting the bed?
Looking back, I realize that the Jones family...
I told you to come and see me, but you never did...
Now, after all this time, you finally come.
You never cease to amaze me...
Have you never seen a maid before?
The truth is... that woman always makes me feel uneasy...
She used to be even more frightening, you know...
she would make me sit facing the wall for an hour...
The mistress talks about you sometimes...
I recognized you the moment we met.
Well, that is a bit embarrassing.
If I remember correctly, this was taken on my 13th birthday...
I am surprised she displays it here...
The Mistress does not have any children of her own.
Do not you think she must consider you as a son?
She was always so angry with me...
That is just how she is.
I hope you learn to like her.
There seems to have been a mistake.
Mr. Graham is apparently waiting at the station.
I will go and fetch him.
I am afraid that I cannot spare you any more time today.
Even retired people have busy schedules.
Next time, inform me by letter when you will arrive.
After all, you must remember your manners.
He is as careless as ever.
He can collect them next time.
I will await your reply when next we meet.
Young Master, your father is calling for you.
Can we stop this Young Master business?
You are the Young Master, after all.
You are surprisingly light on your feet.
I just have to write this...
You seem to turn everyone down...
I did not think you would put your skills of reading and writing to use in this way.
As long as you can work tomorrow.
She never thinks about what other responsibilities we might have.
You are always either playing cards or drinking.
But then again, we are just the same as you, Al!
Let us go down to the Ruth and Bear again today!
A toast, to the God of beer!
Mr. Jones, what can I do for you today?
We have kept something for a special customer such as yourself.
What do you think of this doll?
They are currently all the rage.
Well, how do you feel about this invention?
This is called a tea-making clock.
It is a combination alarm clock and teapot, quite a rare item...
Please deliver that to my house!
I did not notice it was you.
In fact, I was just thinking of visiting the house.
Would you do me the honor...
This park would not be so crowded if it were not for The Season.
On top of that, Sydenham's Crystal Palace was built here for the World Trade Festival...
I am sorry, I am talking too much.
That large elm tree back there was apparently going to be chopped down, but...
Could it be that earlier, you also could not...?
May I buy you a new pair of spectacles as a present?
Please let me buy them for you.
Really, it is no problem at all!
Are you sure you do not want a carriage?
But you just rented that umbrella...
And to be honest, I rather like walking in the rain.
To be honest, so do I.
Well then, I will say goodbye here.
It is all right, I will come back again.
Send my regards to the mistress.
And please do think about the spectacles.
That he should send wilted flowers!
By taking in a little air and water, they seem to have regained their freshness.
I am sure the flowers were not for me anyhow.
He sends his regards to you.
Sometimes you leave dust on the banisters.
Oh dear, I wonder who that dog belongs to?
They might feel strange until you are used to them.
I did not know... how beautiful this view was!
I will be fine, just as I am.
You were looking forward to it.
I know, is not there anything else you want instead?
I would love to have even a single lace handkerchief...
Very well, I will buy you 100, maybe 200!
It is been a dream of mine for years.
Thank you so much, Mr. Jones.
You have bought even more useless objects?
Why do you spend so much time every day in that store?
